Introduction

Rokt is an e-commerce technology platform that enables brands to be smarter in the transaction by optimizing the user experience and driving short and long term value. This site contains developer resources for getting started using Rokt, technical documentation, and code samples. Specific resources include documentation on Rokt’s JavaScript SDK and HTTP API integrations. If you’re looking for documentation on the Rokt Tag, Mobile SDK, or Data Integration, see our Help Centre.

Let’s get started

First, you’ll need to place a code snippet on your website. This code snippet is known as a “Rokt Javascript SDK” and is used to track campaign conversion and analytics and display a Rokt Placement on your site.

The Javascript SDK is an integral part of the Rokt solution and, together with Rokt AI, empowers our clients to optimize a front-end user experience through commerce optimizations and third party offers.

Support

If you have any problems, please submit a ticket to the developer support team. We’ll be happy to assist you.
